T02D1885:164a-31: gri dang rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin

T02D1885:164a-38: rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1885:164a-39: 'khor lo'i lte ba la de dang mtshungs pa'i h'um
T02D1885:164a-40: mdzad rdo rje dang ral gri dang lcags kyu dang
T02D1885:164b-1: g-yon ngos su dbang phyug chen po ni gan rgyal

T02D1885:165a-18: ba dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1885:165a-19: kyi yon tan rin po che'i phung po gzhal yas
T02D1885:165a-21: de'i dbus kyi gdan la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan

T02D1885:165a-27: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par
T02D1885:165a-28: byed pa'i ka la sogs pa nyis 'gyur gsal byed
T02D1885:165a-29: sum cu rtsa bzhi phreng gnyis kyi dbus su gnas
T02D1885:165a-30: pa / dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug yongs su

T02D1885:165a-35: gcig tu gyur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //

T02D1885:165b-5: pha rol phyin ba drug gi rang bzhin ni phyag drug go //

T02D1885:165b-7: kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud cing
T02D1885:165b-8: zhal gyi ro myang ba la dgyes pa lhag ma
T02D1885:165b-9: bzhis rdo rje dmar po dang /
T02D1885:165b-10: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can /
T02D1885:165b-11: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis gnas la shes rab
T02D1885:165b-12: dang thabs kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnam par

T02D1885:165b-14: rje sems dpa' de'i rang bzhin las grub par bdag

T02D1885:165b-18: sgyu ma'i bde ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi tshogs bdag
T02D1885:165b-19: nyid kyi lus la bcug pas bdag nyid rgyas pa'i
T02D1885:165b-20: lha mos mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1885:165b-21: yang des spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo de
T02D1885:165b-22: phyung bas rang dang mtshungs pa'i nang du bsgoms nas
T02D1885:165b-23: / bdag nyid mnyes shing gnyi ga'i rjes su chags par byas nas /
T02D1885:165b-24: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i de bzhin
T02D1885:165b-25: gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid kyi lus la zhugs te

T02D1885:165b-29: pas gtso byas pa'i rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1885:165b-30: bsams te / blo yis skye bo'i tshigs dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir der gzhug par bya'o //

T02D1885:165b-32: gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhal du

T02D1885:165b-40: rnam par sel ba kun du bzang po rnams so

T02D1885:166a-2: ma m'a ma ka'i gos dkar mo sgrol ma rnams
T02D1885:166a-3: so // brum a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes bya bas
